column5: Well after my skunking yesterday I had to redeem myself. I checked the forecast and saw that the rain should stop around 5. Once the rain let off I grabbed my tackle and went back to Bayfront. I started near a loading dock and circled my way down the perimeter of the park, I ended up in a location and knew there HAD to be something there. I was fixing some line I bought from crappy tire (triline - never again) on one rod when my other rod got smashed! Caught a nice steelhead, took a pic and released her. Mission accomplished, needless to say, I will return shortly!
Sweet! Birds nest with one line, fish on the other. It all evens out.
Sweet steelhead!  Although you might want to check the regs, pretty sure you can only fish two lines in Zone 20 if it's from a boat.
wasn't aware of that. thanks for the heads up.
No problem.  Wouldn't want a CO ruining your day!
